definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: Then in both places the rise of nongovernmental organizations gives us real hope.
sentences.chinese: 在贫富国家中都出现了非政府组织，这带给我们希望。

sentences.english: Gan Ning is the Chief Executive of the Lighthouse Project, a non-governmental organisation based in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 为非政府组织，以广州基地，获得乐施会支持。

sentences.english: Each year we see the report cited in the press and by nongovernmental organizations.
sentences.chinese: 每年我们都看到该报告内容被媒体或非政府组织引用。

sentences.english: She praised the government's decision not to deport the migrants.
sentences.chinese: 她称赞南非政府不驱逐这些移民的决定。

sentences.english: Also pay attention to views being expressed by protestors or nongovernmental organisations.
sentences.chinese: 你还应该注意抗议者或者非政府组织表达的观点。

sentences.english: In the name NGOs the whole country continues to be backward.
sentences.chinese: 在非政府组织的名义下，整个国家继续落后。

sentences.english: Sophia Pickles is a logistics officer for a non-governmental organization called GOAL.
sentences.chinese: 苏菲亚皮克是一家非政府机构GOAL的后勤人员。

sentences.english: Avoid grand dichotomies such as the performance of NGOs vs. government.
sentences.chinese: 避免大的二分法，例如非政府组织相对于政府的表现。

sentences.english: The non-governmental organization has released its Corruption Perceptions Index each year since 1998 .
sentences.chinese: 自1998年起，该非政府组织每年公布清廉指数。

sentences.english: Very few nongovernmental organizations or multilateral efforts do good, many Kenyans say.
sentences.chinese: 很少非政府组织或者多边努力有用，很多肯尼亚人说。

sentences.english: This Section is only applicable to NGOs which are not currently receiving subventions from the Social Welfare Department.
sentences.chinese: 此部份只适用于目前并无接受社署资助的非政府机构。

sentences.english: The Chinese government stands ready to make joint efforts with its counterpart of the Central African Republic towards that end.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府愿与中非政府为此共同作出努力。

sentences.english: Save Earth Alliance (SEA) is a non-government , non-profit and non-religion organization.
sentences.chinese: 救地球联盟是非政府，非营利及非宗教团体。

sentences.english: He talks about Shenzhen being “an El Dorado for NGOs”.
sentences.chinese: 他说深圳市是“一个非政府组织的黄金国”。

sentences.english: The third part is the confliction and coordination between non-governmental organizations and WTO.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为非政府组织与WTO的冲突与协调。

sentences.english: He is the technological referent for some professional associations and holds the office of President of Technical & Scientific Commission of FEMTEC (acknowledged World Health Organization).
sentences.chinese: 世温联是被世界卫生组织认可的国际非政府间组织。
